title: Ghost Appears On Zoom Call! | True Ghost Stories
description:
Today on another heart-stopping episode of real ghost Stories Online.

When a mother works a late shift, she takes a break to make a zoom call to her young son, to tell him goodnight. 

When her son urgently starts telling her of a danger that only he can sense, she takes note. 

Even more shocking, is what the young boy witnessed on his mother’s camera!

That story and more, today on Real Ghost Stories Online. 

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:

  • The Worlds LARGEST AUDIO ARCHIVE of GHOST STORIES!
  • New EPP Bonus Episodes Every Week and ALL of our past EPP Bonus Episodes
  • Advance Episodes of the show (ALL AD FREE)

Then sign up to be a supporter, we call them "EPP's" (Extra Podcast People)!
